title: Formative Feedback Design Based on Video Podcasts for Pharmaceutical Calculations

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Blended learning environments utilizing personal devices (BYOD) for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 90% accuracy in solving complex pharmaceutical calculation problems
Learners can correct error causes within three retries using formative feedback provided in video podcasts
Learners can selectively utilize the strengths of text solutions and video podcast feedback depending on the situation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
